project-challenges: All retail APIs are different I had to bring all these different API formats into a single simple UX
project-purpose: Shows highly rated items across many stores that are a dollar or less.
project-inspiration: I love browsing dollar stores. I know that my favorite online stores sell things at low prices too, but it's really hard to find them. I wanted to find out if you could browse your favorite online stores for just items that are a dollar or less like a brick and mortar dollar store.
project-lessons-learned: Infinite Scrolling is a lot of trouble for what it's worth
project-subtitle: A dollar store for the internet
